CardData.Name: Practical_Joke
CardData.Description: Inflict 40 dmg. On the next attack, the enemy has a 40% chance to dmg a member of their team.

CardData.Name: Trauma
CardData.Description: Attack all enemies 3 times for 25  dmg each hit. 50% chance to Apply Heal Block per hit.

CardData.Name: Serate
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 45 dmg and apply Bleed.

CardData.Name: Pandora's_Box
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 40 dmg. On next turn, increase atk power by 50% per debuff on targeted enemy.
